column4: please help me uninstall the new 8.42.3 ati fglrx driver.  i can't login at all (not even failsafe session) because compiz tries to load and i get a white screen of death.
wouldn't just renaming "Driver" fglrx to "ati" in the xorg.conf do the trick?
I was using fglrx before too, not the open source ati driver
so you want revert to the old drivers?
